name: feted
content:
Add to word list

past simple and past participle of
fete
to praise or welcome someone publicly because of their achievements: She was feted by audiences both in her own country and abroad. Synonym
celebrate
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
to admire someone or somethingadmireI've always admired her for her generous spirit.respectI respect her for what she has achieved, but I would have approached it very differently.think highly ofEveryone thinks highly of him.hold someone in high esteemHer colleagues in Washington hold her in very high esteem.hold someone in high regardHe contributed much to the life of York, and was held in high regard there.look up toShe was my older sister and I looked up to her.
